feature1.explanation: Both texts use a mix of punctuation marks such as hyphens, commas, and quotation marks, displaying a similar style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar level of lexical variation and word choice, as well as grammatical structures and part of speech usage.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts show coherence and similar complexity, with comparable lengths and arrangements.

feature4.explanation: In terms of text and discourse features, both texts have a somewhat formal tone and mood, using specific terms related to technical processes.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the analysis of punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, there is a high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
